skills.name: Death's Bargain

Target an ally.

If the ally is dead, heals this champion by 50% of the dead ally’s MAX HP. If all allies are dead, also unlocks a secret skill, [Malice Unleashed]. Places a [Shield] buff on this champion for 2 turns. The value of the [Shield] is equal to any surplus heal. If this champion already has a [Shield] buff, the value of the [Shield] is increased by any surplus heal. Then, fills this champion’s Turn Meter by 75%.
Level 2: Cooldown -1
Level 3: Cooldown -1

If the target has ATK equal or higher than this champion’s ATK, this attack gains a bonus damage multiplier, equal to the target’s ATK. Not applicable to Bosses. If the target’s ATK is less than this Champion’s ATK, this attack will ignore 50% of the target’s DEF.

This attack will also ignore [Block Damage], [Unkillable], [Shield] and [Ally Protection] buffs. Places a [Block Revive] debuff if the target is killed.

Damage Rating
Multiplier: Boss: 7.5*ATK Champions: (7.5*ATK+Target Attack if Target has more Attack)
Overall Grading*: Godlike

If this Champion is already under a [Shield] buff, the value of the [Shield] is increased by 50% of the dead champion’s MAX HP. Does not activate when a boss or minion dies.
[Passive Effect]
Whenever an enemy hits this champion while they are under a [Shield] buff, places a random debuff on the attacking enemy. [Fear], [True Fear], [Freeze], [Provoke], [Petrification], [Sleep] and [Stun] debuffs are placed for 1 turn. Any other debuffs are placed for 2 turns. Will ignore 20% of enemy RES for each dead ally. Cannot place Boss-exclusive debuffs, [Sheep] or [Smite] debuffs.

Will ignore [Unkillable], [Stone Skin] and [Block Damage] buffs. If the target is not under any [Unkillable], [Stone Skin] or [Block Damage] buffs, this attack will deal 100% more damage. Grants an Extra Turn if this attack kills an enemy. Level 2: Damage +10% Level 3: Damage +10% Level 4: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Stonefaced [P]
skills.description: At the start of this Champion’s turn, removes any [Fear], [True Fear], [Provoke], [Stun], [Freeze], [Sleep], and [Petrification] debuffs from this Champion. Increases this Champion’s damage inflicted against targets with no buffs on them by 20%.

skills.name: Wrist Blades
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Heals this Champion by 30% of the damage dealt. [Passive Effect] Whenever this Champion successfully Evades an enemy skill and all of its accompanying effects, counterattacks with this skill. Level 2: Damage +10% Level 3: Damage +10% Level 4: Damage +10%

skills.name: Smart Disc
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 2 times. After hitting the initially selected enemy, all other enemies will be hit in a random order. For the first hit, the damage received by the initially selected enemy will be increased by 75%. Each subsequent enemy hit following the initial hit will receive 15% less bonus damage (reduces to 15% bonus damage). Also destroys each enemy’s MAX HP by 30% of the damage dealt (stacks up to 50%). For the second hit, the damage received by the initially selected enemy will be increased by 15%. Each subsequent enemy hit following the initial hit will receive 15% more bonus damage (stacks up to 75% bonus damage). This attack ignores 15% of each target’s DEF if this Champion is under a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff. Level 2: Damage +10% Level 3: Damage +10% Level 4: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Combistick Throw
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Before attacking, places a [Hunter’s Gaze] debuff for 1 turn. This debuff cannot be resisted if this Champion is under a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff. If this attack kills an enemy, places a [Block Revive] debuff on the target and a [Hunter’s Gaze] debuff on a random alive enemy for 1 turn. The [Hunter’s Gaze] debuff cannot be resisted if this Champion is under a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff. If this attack does not kill an enemy, places a [Perfect Veil] buff on this Champion for 2 turns and fills their Turn Meter by 50%. Level 2: Damage +10% Level 3: Damage +10% Level 4: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Yautja Clock [P]
skills.description: At the start of each Round, places a [Perfect Veil] buff on this Champion for 1 turn. Before this Champion takes a turn, also has an initial 50% chance to Evade an enemy skill and all of its accompanying effects. This initial chance reduces to 0% after this Champion’s first turn in a Round. Whenever this Champion kills an enemy, grants this Champion a 20% chance to Evade enemy skills and accompanying effects (stacks up to 60%).

skills.name: Edenic Blades
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Block Active Skills] debuff for 2 turns. Steals 5% of the target’s Turn Meter for each buff on them. Level 2: Damage +15% Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +10% Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.name: Shackle The Unjust
skills.description: Removes all buffs from all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 100% [Ensnared] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns. This debuff will ignore any [Block Debuffs] buffs on enemies under 3 or more buffs. Also decreases the Turn Meters of all enemies by 25%. If an enemy is under 3 or more buffs, will decrease their Turn Meter by 40% instead. Level 2: Buff/Debuff Chance +10% Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +15% Level 4: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Ethereal Benediction
skills.description: Places a 50% [Increase ACC] buff for 2 turns and 1 [Intercept] stack on all allies. Also fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 25%. Then grants an Extra Turn. Level 2: Cooldown -1 Level 3: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Your Eminence [P]
skills.description: Allies receive 25% less damage from enemies under [Block Damage], [Unkillable], [Veil], [Perfect Veil], or [Stone Skin] buffs. Each time an enemy receives a buff, is healed, or has their Turn Meter filled, has a 50% chance to decrease the duration of all their buffs by 1 turn. Occurs once per skill and once per target. If there are multiple Champions on the team with this skill, only one will activate. This skill will not activate on duplicate copies of this Champion, if this particular Champion is dead.

skills.name: Tail Stab
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns. Places three 5% [Poison] debuffs if this attack is critical. Also places a [Perfect Veil] buff on this Champion for 2 turns. Level 2: Damage +15% Level 3: Damage +15%

skills.name: Infestation
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Before attacking, places a [Stun] debuff and an [Infest] debuff on the target for 2 turns. These debuffs cannot be resisted if this Champion is under a [Perfect Veil] buff. Places a [True Fear] debuff on all other enemies for 1 turn. This debuff cannot be resisted if this Champion is under a [Perfect Veil] buff. [Passive Effect] Revives this Champion with 50% HP and 50% Turn Meter whenever an enemy under an [Infest] debuff dies. Level 2: Damage +15% Level 3: Damage +15% Level 4: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Rip And Claw
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Deals 15% more damage for each [Poison] debuff on the target. Also places a [Perfect Veil] buff on this Champion for 2 turns. Level 2: Damage +15% Level 3: Damage +15% Level 4: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Caustic Blood [P]
skills.description: Whenever this Champion is attacked, has a 25% chance to place a 5% [Poison] debuff on the attacker for 2 turns. This debuff cannot be resisted or blocked if the attack is critical. If an enemy is under a [Poison] debuff placed by this Champion, decreases their DEF by 20%. Level 2: Buff/Debuff chance +10% Level 3: Buff/Debuff chance +15%

skills.name: Pulverizing Pummel
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of decreasing the detonation countdown of all [Bomb] debuffs on the target by 1 turn. Also has a 30% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff on the target for 1 turn. Level 2 – Damage +10% Level 3 – Buff/Debuff chance +10% Level 4 – Damage +10% Level 5 – Buff/Debuff chance +10%

skills.name: Battlefield Sapper
skills.description: Has a 75% chance of placing 2 [Bomb] debuffs on each enemy that detonate after 2 turns. Fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 25% for each enemy with a [Bomb] debuff. Level 2 – Damage +10% Level 3 – Buff/Debuff chance +10% Level 4 – Buff/Debuff chance +10% Level 5 – Cooldown -1

skills.name: Mangonel Maul
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of decrasing the detonation countdown of all [Bomb] debuffs by 1 turn. Also has a 75% chance of placing a [Block Active Skills] debuff for 2 turns. Level 2 – Damage +10% Level 3 – Buff/Debuff chance +10% Level 4 – Buff/Debuff chance +15% Level 5 – Cooldown -1

skills.name: Bomb Breacher
skills.description: Fills all allies’ Turn Meters by 5% each time a [Bomb] debuff detonates. Has a 20% chance of activating an [Instant Turn] effect on this Champion whenever an ally or an enemy is killed by a [Bomb] debuff.

skills.name: West Wind Rush
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Attacks 1 enemy 6 times instead if this Champion has 50% HP or less. Each hit decreases the enemy’s Turn Meter by 7.5% and increases this Champion’s Turn Meter by 7.5%. This effect cannot be resisted if this Champion is under a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff. Level 2: Damage +10% Level 3: Damage +10% Level 4: Damage +10%

skills.name: Spear Of Leonidas
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Before attacking, places a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff and a [HP Burn] debuff on the target for 3 turns. These debuffs cannot be resisted if this Champion is under a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff. Places a [Stun] debuff on all enemies for 1 turn if the damage dealt by this skill is more than 50% of target’s MAX HP. This debuff cannot be resisted if this Champion is under a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff. Level 2: Damage +10% Level 3: Damage +10% Level 4: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Isu's Blessing
skills.description: Removes all debuffs from this Champion, heals them by 50% of their MAX HP, and fills their Turn Meter by 50%. Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff, a 15% [Shatter] buff, and a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on this Champion for 2 turns. [Passive Effect] Prevents this Champion’s death and keeps them alive on 1 HP if they are under an [Increase ATK] buff, [Shatter] buff, and [Increase SPD] buff. Level 2: Cooldown -1 Level 3: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Everything Is Permitted [P]
skills.description: Whenever an enemy’s HP drops below 25% after receiving damage from any Assassin, they receive additional bonus damage proportional to this Champion’s ATK. This bonus damage will ignore 100% of the target’s DEF and cannot be critical.

skills.name: Blood Of Sparta [P]
skills.description: Whenever this Champion attacks an enemy, increases this Champion’s ATK by an amount equal to 50% of the target’s DEF. Whenever an enemy attacks this Champion, increases this Champion’s DEF by an amount equal to 50% of the attacker’s ATK.

skills.name: Dagger Swirl
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns. If this Champion is under a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff, the chance increases to 100%. Then has a 50% chance of applying a [Debuff Spread] effect, taking 1 random debuff from the target and placing it on all enemies. If this Champion is under a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff, the chance increases to 100%. Level 2: Damage +5% Level 3: Damage +5% Level 4: Damage +5% Level 5: Damage +5%

skills.name: Up In Smoke
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Will ignore 15% of each target’s DEF. Will ignore 30% of each target’s DEF instead if this Champion is under a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Block Active Skills] debuff for 2 turns. This debuff will ignore any [Block Debuffs] buffs if this Champion is under a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff. Level 2: Damage +10% Level 3: Damage +10% Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +10% Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +15% Level 6: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Winds Of Baghdad
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Deals 5% more damage for each buff and debuff on this Champion and 5% more damage for each buff and debuff on the target (stacks up to 100%). Places a [Perfect Veil] buff on this Champion for 3 turns, and grants an Extra Turn. Level 2: Damage +10% Level 3: Damage +10% Level 4: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Everything Is Permitted [P]
skills.description: Whenever an enemy’s HP drops below 25% after receiving damage from any Assassin, they receive additional bonus damage proportional to this Champion’s ATK. This bonus damage will ignore 100% of the target’s DEF and cannot be critical.

skills.name: Masterful Thief [P]
skills.description: Whenever this Champion is attacked, steals 1 random buff from the attacker and transfers 1 random debuff from this Champion to the attacker. These effects will ignore [Polymorph]. Occurs once per skill. Will ignore 25% of a target’s RES when using skills if this Champion is under a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff.

skills.name: Privateer Blitz
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 75% chance of decreasing the target’s Turn Meter by 15%. Each hit will decrease the target’s Turn Meter by 25% instead if the attack is critical. This effect cannot be resisted if this Champion is under a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff. Level 2: Damage +10% Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +10% Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.name: Fan The Hammer
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 2 times. The first hit steals all buffs from all enemies and decreases each enemy’s Turn Meter by 20%. This effect cannot be resisted if this Champion is under a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff. The second hit has a 75% chance of placing a [Sleep] debuff on all enemies for 1 turn. This debuff will ignore any [Block Debuffs] buffs if the attack is critical. This effect cannot be resisted if this Champion is under a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff. Level 2: Damage +10% Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +10% Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +15% Level 5: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Between The Eyes
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Before attacking, places a [Perfect Veil] buff on this Champion, as well as any other Assassins on the team for 2 turns. Will ignore [Shield], [Stone Skin], and [Block Damage] buffs. Places a [Block Revive] debuff if the target is killed. Level 2: Damage +10% Level 3: Cooldown -1 Level 4: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Everything Is Permitted [P]
skills.description: Whenever an enemy’s HP drops below 25% after receiving damage from any Assassin, they receive additional bonus damage proportional to this Champion’s ATK. This bonus damage will ignore 100% of the target’s DEF and cannot be critical.

skills.name: Keelhaul [P]
skills.description: Each hit inflicted by this Champion has a 50% chance of placing a 100% [Ensnare] debuff on their target for 2 turns. Whenever this Champion kills an enemy, places a 100% [Ensnare] debuff on all other enemies for 2 turns and decreases their Turn Meter by 20%. These effects cannot be resisted if this Champion is under a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff. This Champion inflicts 20% more damage against targets under [Ensnare] debuffs.

skills.name: Ax Pirouette
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit will ignore 10% of the target’s DEF. Each critical hit has a 75% chance of stealing 1 random buff from the target. Level 2: Damage +15% Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +10% Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.name: Shatter Limbs
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. The damage inflicted by this skill increases by 10% for each debuff on the target (stacks up to 100%). Each hit has a 75% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns. Level 2: Buff/Debuff Chance +10% Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +15% Level 4: Cooldown -1 Level 5: Cooldown -1

skills.name: For Hrothglime!
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Before attacking, places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Has a 40% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn. Level 2: Damage +20% Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +10% Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +10% Level 5: Cooldown -1 Level 6: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Fight Dirty [P]
skills.description: Allies deal 15% more damage to targets under a [Heal Reduction] or a [Stun] debuff placed by this Champion. If there are multiple Champions on the team with this skill, only one will activate.

skills.name: Roll With The Times
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Heals this Champion by 5% of their MAX HP. Level 2: Damage +5% Level 3: Damage +5% Level 4: Damage +5% Level 5: Damage +5%

skills.name: Reclusive Sage
skills.description: Heals all allies by 15% of this Champion’s MAX HP, and fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 15%. Also places a 25% [Increase RES] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Level 2: Cooldown -1 Level 3: Cooldown -1

skills.name: You've Much To Learn
skills.description: Revives an ally with 75% HP and 50% Turn Meter. Places an [Unkillable] buff and a 30% [Reflect Damage] buff on that ally for 2 turns. Level 2: Cooldown -1 Level 3: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Outliver Of Empires [P]
skills.description: Heals this Champion by 25% of their MAX HP whenever an ally dies. Heals all allies by 50% of this Champion’s MAX HP whenever this Champion dies.

skills.name: Phantom Pack
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 35% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns. Level 2: Damage +5% Level 3: Damage +5% Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +5% Level 5: Damage +10% Level 6: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Ghostly Roots
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn. Level 2: Damage +10% Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +10% Level 4: Damage +10% Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +15% Level 6: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Arooo!
skills.description: Places a [Counterattack] buff on this Champion for 2 turns. Also places a 50% [Ally Protection] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Level 2: Cooldown -1 Level 3: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Safety in Numbers [P]
skills.description: Decreases the damage this Champion recieves by 5% for each ally under an [Ally Protection] buff placed by this Champion.

skills.name: Vineblades
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 25% chance of placing a [Leech] debuff for 2 turns. Level 2: Damage +10% Level 3: Damage +10% Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +10% Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.name: Horrifying Visage
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 2 times. The first hit has a 75% chance of placing a [Fear] debuff for 1 turn. The second hit has a 75% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff for 2 turns. Level 2: Damage +10% Level 3: Damage +10% Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +10% Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +15% Level 6: Cooldown -1

skills.name: One With Corruption
skills.description: Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Also places a [Counterattack] buff and a 50% [Increase RES] buff on this Champion for 2 turns. Level 2: Cooldown -1 Level 3: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Dark Sustenance [P]
skills.description: Before this Champion uses a skill to deal damage, heals this Champion. The value of the heal is proportional to this Champion’s DEF.

skills.name: Portable Cannonade
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 80% chance of transferring 1 random debuff from this Champion to the target. Level 2: Damage +5% Level 3: Damage +5% Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +10% Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Scattershot Barrage
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of removing 1 random buff from all enemies. Has a 75% chance of stealing 2 random buffs instead, if the target is under a [Block Buffs] or [Block Active Skills] debuff. Level 2: Damage +10% Level 3: Damage +10% Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +10% Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +15% Level 6: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Beast Feller
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. The first hit has a 75% chance of placing a [Block Buffs] debuff for 2 turns. The second hit has a 75% chance of placing a [Block Active Skills] debuff for 2 turns. The third hit has a 50% chance of applying a Debuff Spread effect, taking 1 random debuff from the target and placing it on all other enemies. Level 2: Damage +10% Level 3: Damage +10% Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +10% Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +15% Level 6: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Eyes of a Sunseeker [P]
skills.description: This Champion deals 15% more damage to enemies whose ACC is less than this Champion’s.

skills.name: Lover's Barb
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each critical hit will ignore 5% of the target’s DEF. Level 2: Damage +5% Level 3: Damage +5% Level 4: Damage +10%

skills.name: Rake's Flair
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 15% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns. Level 2: Damage +5% Level 3: Damage +10% Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +10% Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +15% Level 6: Cooldown -1

skills.name: I Fight For Love!
skills.description: Places a 25% [Increase ATK] and a 15% [Increase C. RATE] buff on this Champion for 2 turns. Grants an Extra Turn. Level 2: Cooldown -1 Level 3: Cooldown -1
